website_summaries.verdict: A variety pack of 6 flavors of reliable wood chips that don't require soaking.
pros: Can work with any kind of outdoor grill
A good gift for any fan of smoked meat
A good way to experiment with flavors
cons: Bags might be a little small if you have a big smoker

customer_reviews.title: Really adds a lot of superb flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these smoking pellets along with the A-maz'n 12" smoker tube. I put about half a cup of pellets of my choice in the tube, place them on my propane grill gate and light them with a propane torch. Let burn 2-3 minutes and blow out the flame. Put the meat, fish, cheese or nuts of your choice on the top shelf of your grill and close the lid. The pellets will burn for 2-3 hours and they impart a wonderful smoky flavor to anything you wish. It's a quick and flavorful way to get that "low and slow" smoke flavor when you just have enough time to grill your meal in the normal fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rayda

customer_reviews.title: ... try the different flavors to see which ones I like the best and order those in bulk later
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to try the different flavors to see which ones I like the best and order those in bulk later......now the problem is that my family, friends and I like all of them. SMH. I used these in my Char-broil big easy 3 in 1 and was very surprised at the amount of smoke these produced in comparison to your traditional wood chips. I've always had problems with keeping the embers lit at lower temperatures (Under 325°F) in the big easy but, these allowed me to maintain about 250°F with a lot of smoke. Only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because it's a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Haruno

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying grilling even more now!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used wood pellets but have tried wood chips before. First wood chips either burn up quick or are hard to get going after soaking and the flavor from wood chips seems hit or miss. These burn steady once lit and the flavor is constant with all of them except the JD wasn't that impressive. All the rest were amazing and I will retry the JD again down the road as I still have a half bag. Moving forward I will only use wood pellets. I even ordered the smaller 4 bag deal for my Dad for Father's day as the 6 pack was going to take too long to get to him.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Frericks

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I have smoked a brisket and several racks of ribs since purchasing these a month or so ago. The flavor is amazing with these! I microwave for about 3 mins about a half hour before I am ready to use them. A soup bowls worth gives me about 8 hours of smoke. I will definitely be purchasing these again!
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Pellets
customer_reviews.text: Good quality pellets. The Jack Daniels, Cherrywood, Hickory anf Mesquite pellets are great.. lite em with a torch, let em burn for ten minutes and gently blow them out. Smike flavor all in unless your from the land of Cali then dont use these because they may give you cancer. FYI There is Deet in the blood of Polar Bears . This was studied in the 70’s. DEET ALSO CAUSES CANCER.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great way to try a variety of pellets
customer_reviews.text: Still haven’t worked my way through all of these but I’m so glad I made this purchase. As a novice smoker, I had a variety of things I wanted to try but didn’t know which pellets to get. This allowed me to try a variety without breaking the bank or making a costly mistake. These are small bags & each one does about one good smoke with a little left over (but not enough for another smoker session). So, don’t expect a huge quantity but it is a fantastic way to try a variety of pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Seem to Work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this packet in order to try different flavors for my smoking. I have tried two different ones so far. I packem in my Lizzo smoking tube, lit them and let them burn outside the smoker for about 10 to 15 minutes. I then put them in my Akorn smoker and they quit within minutes. They just snuffed out. Not happy and will write an update if the other packets work better, but I see no reason why they will.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Smoker Flash Fire when using Pellets
customer_reviews.text: The Jack Daniels wood pellets started a flash fire and caused damage to my brother in law's smoker when using this products. Had never used these type of wood pellets previously. These were used by an EXPERIENCED person with smokers! These were a gift to him at Christmas:(
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M. Bridgett

customer_reviews.title: Good way to try different wood flavors
customer_reviews.text: If you're using pellets for smoking and you want to find what flavor you like with different foods this is a good way to experiment. Once you find the wood you like it's way cheaper to buy the large bags. I use pellets in a tube smoker then place it in my electric smoker. With the power off and ice in the water tray I can cold smoke foods under 80 degrees. These pellets seem to burn slowly with nice amount of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Pound for pound, the most expensive pellets you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection, but REALLY expensive. I did not realize how small a 1 pound bag of pellets is. Pound for pound, these are about twice the price of other premium pellets. I am now doubting the value of the selection...
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a BBQ host!
customer_reviews.text: My step dad LOVES cooking for guests. He got a smoker a little over a year ago and has us over frequently for cookouts, so when I saw this I couldn't resist. I gave it to him for Christmas and he loved it! For the superbowl, he made ribs and used the apple flavor and wow... they were delicious! I've since sent him the link so he can order more for himself for the upcoming summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Got to try different flavors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try the different flavors. I just find it easier to just go down to a home improvement store and pick up a 40 lb bag for less money. It is alright if you want to get an idea if you are looking for a particular flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for New Grill Owner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my brother who recently bought a brand new grill, he loved it. Pellets are something everyone with a grill should experiment with! I highly suggest also buying a Pellet Smoking Tube to go with the variety pack to complete the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: wrong item for my smoker
customer_reviews.text: Amazon suggested the smoker cover and these chips when I bought my smoker - so I purchased the 3 together. When I seasoned the smoker and was getting ready to use them - my smoker directions told me I could not use the pellets with this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Hospital

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing these. I bought them for my son. He grills and smokes meat quite a lot. He liked these so well the first time so when he mentioned that he had used all the bags/flavors I ordered again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa H.

customer_reviews.title: Variety and flavor are great!
customer_reviews.text: The pellets last forever. I love that I am able to try out the different woods without committing to a bigger bag. So far, I've smoked 5 large pork butts, a brisket, and a 25lb turkey and I have even used two entire bags of pellets. We add pellets every hour as suggested. The meat is always well flavored.
customer_reviews.author: mrschains

customer_reviews.title: Made My Father-in-Law Happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father-in-law for Christmas. He loves to smoke and thought this would be perfect. He has raved and raved about these. He said the taste is phenomenal, they last longer than other chips/pellets. He has commented to me many times how much he loves these. I will be ordering again!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie A. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great pellets, good way to try different smokes
customer_reviews.text: Have only used pecan and mesquite thus far. The pellets light easily and add fantastic flavor and aroma. The neighbors complimented the aroma after the very first night!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and everyone was pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my oldest son who is a grilling/smoking enthusiast who uses a Traeger smoker. He was very pleased with the quality. The stars represent his opinions.

customer_reviews.title: great sample pack
customer_reviews.text: I think its a great way to try different flavors of pellets, we use the amazn smoke tube so far they all are great and create a good amount of smoke

customer_reviews.text: These bags are so small you can’t smoke anything. Picture a full packed quart size bag of pellets. I have to send them back. It was a let down.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a sample pack
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE SAMPLE BAGS! They are 1 pound bags each. One bag will fill up the 5x8 A-MAZE-N smoker maze. This sample product is for you to try different smoke pellets and see what you like. It’s perfect.

customer_reviews.text: Great way to try out different flavors, all of them have smoked great and evenly for me, I will buy this brand again for sure.

customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor choices and the combinations that I mixed in my smoker. These left great flavors when I smoke my deck. Now I'm going to smoke my turkey and chickens this Thanksgiving. And I'm definitely going to buy more preferably in bigger bags.

customer_reviews.text: All pellets are super high quality, no dust, and the flavors are great. Not too overpowering, but not so subtle you can't taste them. The sampler was a fantastic idea. I will be getting some full-size bags of apple and cherry for sure!

product_meta.title: BBQrs Delight Wood Smoking Pellets - Super Smoker Variety Value Pack - 1 Lb. Bag - Apple, Hickory, Mesquite, Cherry, Pecan and Jack Daniel's
product_meta.description:
Included in this BBQr's Delight wood smoker pellet super variety pack is the 6 most popular wood smoking pellets. These food-grade wood pellets are the fastest and easiest way to give your food smoke flavor on any gas, charcoal or electric outdoor cooker. 

Apple pellets are made of 100% Apple wood. Apple is a sweet, fruity smoke and is the strongest of all the fruit woods. It's perfect for grilling beef, pork, ham, poultry, fish or wild game. 

Hickory pellets are the most common and popular smoke wood pellet used in barbecuing. They are made out of 100% hickory wood and produce a stronger flavor that complements all meats.

Jack Daniel's pellets are made from the used mellowing charcoal from the Jack Daniel's Distillery in Lynchburg, Tennessee. This charcoal is soaked in whiskey for weeks before exchanging for a fresh batch of charcoal. The charcoal is mixed with oak wood and processed into wood pellets for BBQ smoking.

Cherry pellets are made with 100% Cherry wood. Cherry gives you a mild sweet fruity smoke that gives a rosy tint to lighter meats.

Mesquite pellets are made of 100% mesquite. This southwestern favorite produces a very distinctive smoke and stronger smoke flavor.

Pecan pellets are made of 100% Pecan wood. Pecan is very similar to hickory but milder and sweeter with a nut after-taste.

Only 1/3 of a cup of pellets is needed for most cooking events. When used as directed you have enough pellets for 60 cooking events.

You can use the wood flavored pellets individually or experiment and make your own "special blend" by combining different pellet flavors for whatever meat you want to enhance the flavor of. 

Since pellets have been processed from sawdust by pressure which generates heat, any contaminants present in the wood are eliminated.
feature_bullets: Includes 1 pound bag of each flavor Apple, Hickory, Mesquite, Cherry, Pecan and Jack Daniel's
10 uses per bag (only 1/3 cup per use is needed) - No soaking necessary-- Easy to Use
Works with any type of outside grill: Gas, Charcoal, Electric or Smoker
Important --these are not to be confused with pellet fuel. These are flavor pellets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars897 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
